name: Connect to my Documents
desc: Perform APIdoc site connection to grant you access to your document repository from Point.io Apps

template.name: Connect to my Documents
template.desc: Perform APIdoc site connection to grant you access to your document repository from Point.io Apps

facts.Comment: By entering key/value pairs below, you can preconfigure the Repo fields for your organisation. Enter fieldNAmes in all UPPER CASE

forms.taskname: See the result of the connection to your repository

data.diagram_xml:
<xml xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">
  <block type="newApp" id="167" inline="false" deletable="false" x="0" y="0">
    <mutation formcount="3" factcount="3" forms=",Select your repository type,poi_Selectyourrepositorytype_form,Fill in your repository credentials,poi_Fillinyourrepositorycredentials_form,See the result of the connection to your repository,poi_Seetheresultoftheconnectiontoyourrepository_form" facts=",List Site Type,poi_ListSiteType_fact,List Site Arguments,poi_ListSiteArguments_fact,Save Site,poi_SaveSite_fact" factmap=",LIST_RECORDSMap,READMap,CREATEMap"></mutation>
    <field name="PROCESSTYPES">["Create Site","Create_Site:2:71"]</field>
    <value name="FORM_1">
      <block type="Form" id="168">
        <field name="FORMS">56c2104f6edc199b009276b8</field>
      </block>
    </value>
    <value name="FORM_2">
      <block type="Form" id="169">
        <field name="FORMS">56c210506edc19a2009276ba</field>
      </block>
    </value>
    <value name="FORM_3">
      <block type="Form" id="170">
        <field name="FORMS">56c210526edc19a2009276bc</field>
      </block>
    </value>
    <value name="FACT_1">
      <block type="newFact" id="171" inline="false">
        <mutation inputcount="1" type="LIST Recs"></mutation>
        <field name="FACTS">56c210756edc1996009276d4</field>
        <field name="factTypes">LIST Recs</field>
        <field name="display">never</field>
        <value name="INPUT_0">
          <block type="variable" id="172">
            <field name="SELECT">objTypeId</field>
          </block>
        </value>
      </block>
    </value>
    <value name="FACT_2">
      <block type="newFact" id="173" inline="false">
        <mutation inputcount="2" type="READ"></mutation>
        <field name="FACTS">56c210756edc1996009276d4</field>
        <field name="factTypes">READ</field>
        <field name="display">never</field>
        <value name="INPUT_0">
          <block type="variable" id="174">
            <mutation custominput="true"></mutation>
            <field name="SELECT">other</field>
            <field name="NAME">siteTypeId</field>
          </block>
        </value>
        <value name="INPUT_1">
          <block type="variable" id="175">
            <field name="SELECT">objTypeId</field>
          </block>
        </value>
      </block>
    </value>
    <value name="FACT_3">
      <block type="newFact" id="176" inline="false">
        <mutation inputcount="3" type="CREATE"></mutation>
        <field name="FACTS">56c210756edc1996009276d4</field>
        <field name="factTypes">CREATE</field>
        <field name="display">never</field>
        <value name="INPUT_2">
          <block type="json_create_with" id="177" inline="false">
            <mutation items="1"></mutation>
            <value name="ADD0">
              <block type="entry" id="178" inline="true">
                <value name="KEY">
                  <block type="text" id="179">
                    <field name="TEXT">data</field>
                  </block>
                </value>
                <value name="VALUE">
                  <block type="text" id="180">
                    <field name="TEXT">$$createData</field>
                  </block>
                </value>
              </block>
            </value>
          </block>
        </value>
      </block>
    </value>
  </block>
</xml>

PROCESSTYPE.name: Create Site
PROCESSTYPE.BPMNXML: <definitions targetNamespace="http://www.activiti.org/test" expressionLanguage="http://www.w3.org/1999/XPath" typeLanguage="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:omgdi="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DI" xmlns:omgdc="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DC" xmlns:bpmndi="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/DI" xmlns="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/MODEL"><message name="injectListJSON" id="injectListJSON"/><process isExecutable="true" name="Create Site" id="Create_Site"><documentation>%3Cxml%20xmlns%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F1999%2Fxhtml%22%3E%3Cblock%20type%3D%22start%22%20id%3D%2214%22%20deletable%3D%22false%22%20x%3D%220%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3Cfield%20name%3D%22NAME%22%3ECreate%20Site%3C%2Ffield%3E%3Cnext%3E%3Cblock%20type%3D%22serviceTask%22%20id%3D%2216%22%3E%3Cfield%20name%3D%22NAME%22%3EList%20Site%20Type%3C%2Ffield%3E%3Cfield%20name%3D%22factType%22%3ELIST_RECORDS%3C%2Ffield%3E%3Cnext%3E%3Cblock%20type%3D%22userTask%22%20id%3D%2217%22%20inline%3D%22false%22%3E%3Cfield%20name%3D%22NAME%22%3ESelect%20your%20repository%20type%3C%2Ffield%3E%3Cvalue%20name%3D%22assignee%22%3E%3Cblock%20type%3D%22currentAssignee%22%20id%3D%2218%22%3E%3C%2Fblock%3E%3C%2Fvalue%3E%3Cnext%3E%3Cblock%20type%3D%22serviceTask%22%20id%3D%2219%22%3E%3Cfield%20name%3D%22NAME%22%3EList%20Site%20Arguments%3C%2Ffield%3E%3Cfield%20name%3D%22factType%22%3EREAD%3C%2Ffield%3E%3Cnext%3E%3Cblock%20type%3D%22userTask%22%20id%3D%2220%22%20inline%3D%22false%22%3E%3Cfield%20name%3D%22NAME%22%3EFill%20in%20your%20repository%20credentials%3C%2Ffield%3E%3Cvalue%20name%3D%22assignee%22%3E%3Cblock%20type%3D%22currentAssignee%22%20id%3D%2221%22%3E%3C%2Fblock%3E%3C%2Fvalue%3E%3Cnext%3E%3Cblock%20type%3D%22serviceTask%22%20id%3D%2222%22%3E%3Cfield%20name%3D%22NAME%22%3ESave%20Site%3C%2Ffield%3E%3Cfield%20name%3D%22factType%22%3ECREATE%3C%2Ffield%3E%3Cnext%3E%3Cblock%20type%3D%22userTask%22%20id%3D%2223%22%20inline%3D%22false%22%3E%3Cfield%20name%3D%22NAME%22%3ESee%20the%20result%20of%20the%20connection%20to%20your%20repository%3C%2Ffield%3E%3Cvalue%20name%3D%22assignee%22%3E%3Cblock%20type%3D%22currentAssignee%22%20id%3D%2224%22%3E%3C%2Fblock%3E%3C%2Fvalue%3E%3Cnext%3E%3Cblock%20type%3D%22end%22%20id%3D%2225%22%20deletable%3D%22false%22%3E%3C%2Fblock%3E%3C%2Fnext%3E%3C%2Fblock%3E%3C%2Fnext%3E%3C%2Fblock%3E%3C%2Fnext%3E%3C%2Fblock%3E%3C%2Fnext%3E%3C%2Fblock%3E%3C%2Fnext%3E%3C%2Fblock%3E%3C%2Fnext%3E%3C%2Fblock%3E%3C%2Fnext%3E%3C%2Fblock%3E%3C%2Fxml%3E</documentation><startEvent name="Create Site" id="start"/><sequenceFlow targetRef="serviceTask2" sourceRef="start" id="flow1"/><serviceTask activiti:class="plugins.facts" name="List Site Type" id="serviceTask2"><extensionElements><activiti:field name="PluginKey"><activiti:string>poi_ListSiteType_fact</activiti:string></activiti:field><activiti:field name="parameterMap"><activiti:expression>${LIST_RECORDSMap}</activiti:expression></activiti:field></extensionElements></serviceTask><sequenceFlow targetRef="userTask3" sourceRef="serviceTask2" id="flow2"/><userTask activiti:assignee="${wf_currentAssignee}" activiti:formKey="poi_Selectyourrepositorytype_form" name="Select your repository type" id="userTask3"/><boundaryEvent attachedToRef="userTask3" cancelActivity="false" name="Message" id="boundarymessage3"><messageEventDefinition messageRef="injectListJSON"/></boundaryEvent><sequenceFlow targetRef="serviceTask4" sourceRef="userTask3" id="flow4"/><serviceTask activiti:class="plugins.facts" name="List Site Arguments" id="serviceTask4"><extensionElements><activiti:field id="flow5"/><userTask activiti:assignee="${wf_currentAssignee}" activiti:formKey="poi_Fillinyourrepositorycredentials_form" name="Fill in your repository credentials" id="userTask5"/><boundaryEvent attachedToRef="userTask5" cancelActivity="false" name="Message" id="boundarymessage6"><messageEventDefinition messageRef="injectListJSON"/></boundaryEvent><sequenceFlow targetRef="serviceTask6" sourceRef="userTask5" id="flow7"/><serviceTask activiti:class="plugins.facts" name="Save Site" id="serviceTask6"><extensionElements><activiti:field name="PluginKey"><activiti:string>poi_SaveSite_fact</activiti:string></activiti:field><activiti:field name="parameterMap"><activiti:expression>${CREATEMap}</activiti:expression></activiti:field></extensionElements></serviceTask><sequenceFlow targetRef="userTask7" sourceRef="serviceTask6" id="flow8"/><userTask activiti:assignee="${wf_currentAssignee}" activiti:formKey="poi_Seetheresultoftheconnectiontoyourrepository_form" name="See the result of the connection to your repository" id="userTask7"/><boundaryEvent attachedToRef="userTask7" cancelActivity="false" name="Message" id="boundarymessage9"><messageEventDefinition messageRef="injectListJSON"/></boundaryEvent><sequenceFlow targetRef="end" sourceRef="userTask7" id="flow10"/><endEvent name="end" id="end"/></process></definitions>

PROCESSTYPE.name: site Fact Provider Flow
PROCESSTYPE.BPMNXML:
<definitions targetNamespace="http://www.activiti.org/test" expressionLanguage="http://www.w3.org/1999/XPath" typeLanguage="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:omgdi="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DI" xmlns:omgdc="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DC" xmlns:bpmndi="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/DI" xmlns:activiti="http://activiti.org/bpmn" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/MODEL">
  <process isExecutable="true" name="site Fact Provider Flow" id="site_provider">
    <startEvent name="Start" id="startevent1"/>
    <sequenceFlow targetRef="exclusivegateway1" sourceRef="startevent1" id="flow1"/>
    <endEvent name="End" id="endevent1"/>
    <exclusiveGateway default="default" name="Exclusive Gateway" id="exclusivegateway1"/>
    <sequenceFlow targetRef="endevent1" sourceRef="exclusivegateway1" name="Unsupported" id="default"/>
    <sequenceFlow targetRef="servicetask2" sourceRef="exclusivegateway1" name="GETRECS" id="flow2">
      <conditionExpression xsi:type="tFormalExpression">${apidata_method == "GETRECS"}</conditionExpression>
    </sequenceFlow>
    <serviceTask activiti:class="plugins.fact_components.api_APIdocSite_Read" name="Read" id="servicetask1">
      <extensionElements>
        <activiti:field name="objId">
          <activiti:expression>${objId}</activiti:expression>
        </activiti:field>
        <activiti:field name="objTypeId">
          <activiti:expression>${objTypeId}</activiti:expression>
        </activiti:field>
      </extensionElements>
    </serviceTask>
    <sequenceFlow targetRef="endevent1" sourceRef="servicetask1" id="flow4"/>
    <sequenceFlow targetRef="servicetask1" sourceRef="exclusivegateway1" name="GET" id="flow5">
      <conditionExpression xsi:type="tFormalExpression">${apidata_method == "GET"}</conditionExpression>
    </sequenceFlow>
    <serviceTask activiti:class="plugins.fact_components.api_APIdocSite_List_Recs" name="List Record" id="servicetask2">
      <extensionElements>
        <activiti:field name="objTypeId">
          <activiti:expression>${objTypeId}</activiti:expression>
        </activiti:field>
      </extensionElements>
    </serviceTask>
    <sequenceFlow targetRef="endevent1" sourceRef="servicetask2" id="flow6"/>
    <serviceTask activiti:class="plugins.fact_components.api_APIdocSite_Create" name="Create" id="servicetask3">
      <extensionElements>
        <activiti:field name="objId">
          <activiti:expression>${objId}</activiti:expression>
        </activiti:field>
        <activiti:field name="objTypeId">
          <activiti:expression>${objTypeId}</activiti:expression>
        </activiti:field>
        <activiti:field name="data">
          <activiti:expression>${data}</activiti:expression>
        </activiti:field>
      </extensionElements>
    </serviceTask>
    <sequenceFlow targetRef="servicetask3" sourceRef="exclusivegateway1" name="POST" id="flow7">
      <conditionExpression xsi:type="tFormalExpression">${apidata_method == "POST"}</conditionExpression>
    </sequenceFlow>
    <sequenceFlow targetRef="endevent1" sourceRef="servicetask3" id="flow8"/>
  </process>
  <bpmndi:BPMNDiagram id="BPMNDiagram_site_provider">
    <bpmndi:BPMNPlane id="BPMNPlane_site_provider" bpmnElement="site_provider">
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="BPMNShape_startevent1" bpmnElement="startevent1">
        <omgdc:Bounds y="164.0" x="70.0" width="35.0" height="35.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="BPMNShape_endevent1" bpmnElement="endevent1">
        <omgdc:Bounds y="164.0" x="740.0" width="35.0" height="35.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="BPMNShape_exclusivegateway1" bpmnElement="exclusivegateway1">
        <omgdc:Bounds y="161.0" x="150.0" width="40.0" height="40.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="BPMNShape_servicetask1" bpmnElement="servicetask1">
        <omgdc:Bounds y="310.0" x="334.0" width="105.0" height="55.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="BPMNShape_servicetask2" bpmnElement="servicetask2">
        <omgdc:Bounds y="220.0" x="334.0" width="105.0" height="55.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="BPMNShape_servicetask3" bpmnElement="servicetask3">
        <omgdc:Bounds y="390.0" x="334.0" width="105.0" height="55.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="BPMNEdge_flow1" bpmnElement="flow1">
        <omgdi:waypoint y="181.0" x="105.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint y="181.0" x="150.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="BPMNEdge_default" bpmnElement="default">
        <omgdi:waypoint y="181.0" x="190.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint y="181.0" x="740.0"/>
        <bpmndi:BPMNLabel>
          <omgdc:Bounds y="164.0" x="209.0" width="63.0" height="13.0"/>
        </bpmndi:BPMNLabel>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="BPMNEdge_flow2" bpmnElement="flow2">
        <omgdi:waypoint y="201.0" x="170.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint y="247.0" x="170.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint y="247.0" x="334.0"/>
        <bpmndi:BPMNLabel>
          <omgdc:Bounds y="219.0" x="180.0" width="53.0" height="13.0"/>
        </bpmndi:BPMNLabel>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="BPMNEdge_flow4" bpmnElement="flow4">
        <omgdi:waypoint y="337.0" x="439.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint y="337.0" x="757.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint y="199.0" x="757.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="BPMNEdge_flow5" bpmnElement="flow5">
        <omgdi:waypoint y="201.0" x="170.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint y="337.0" x="170.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint y="337.0" x="334.0"/>
        <bpmndi:BPMNLabel>
          <omgdc:Bounds y="309.0" x="192.0" width="23.0" height="13.0"/>
        </bpmndi:BPMNLabel>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="BPMNEdge_flow6" bpmnElement="flow6">
        <omgdi:waypoint y="247.0" x="439.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint y="247.0" x="757.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint y="199.0" x="757.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="BPMNEdge_flow7" bpmnElement="flow7">
        <omgdi:waypoint y="201.0" x="170.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint y="417.0" x="170.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint y="417.0" x="334.0"/>
        <bpmndi:BPMNLabel>
          <omgdc:Bounds y="389.0" x="192.0" width="100.0" height="13.0"/>
        </bpmndi:BPMNLabel>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="BPMNEdge_flow8" bpmnElement="flow8">
        <omgdi:waypoint y="417.0" x="439.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint y="416.0" x="756.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint y="199.0" x="757.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
    </bpmndi:BPMNPlane>
  </bpmndi:BPMNDiagram>
</definitions>

PROCESSTYPE.name: site Fact Provider Flow
PROCESSTYPE.BPMNXML:
<definitions targetNamespace="http://www.activiti.org/test" expressionLanguage="http://www.w3.org/1999/XPath" typeLanguage="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:omgdi="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DI" xmlns:omgdc="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DC" xmlns:bpmndi="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/DI" xmlns:activiti="http://activiti.org/bpmn" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/MODEL">
  <process isExecutable="true" name="site Fact Provider Flow" id="site_provider">
    <startEvent name="Start" id="startevent1"/>
    <sequenceFlow targetRef="exclusivegateway1" sourceRef="startevent1" id="flow1"/>
    <endEvent name="End" id="endevent1"/>
    <exclusiveGateway default="default" name="Exclusive Gateway" id="exclusivegateway1"/>
    <sequenceFlow targetRef="endevent1" sourceRef="exclusivegateway1" name="Unsupported" id="default"/>
    <sequenceFlow targetRef="servicetask2" sourceRef="exclusivegateway1" name="GETRECS" id="flow2">
      <conditionExpression xsi:type="tFormalExpression">${apidata_method == "GETRECS"}</conditionExpression>
    </sequenceFlow>
    <serviceTask activiti:class="plugins.fact_components.api_APIdocSite_Read" name="Read" id="servicetask1">
      <extensionElements>
        <activiti:field name="objId">
          <activiti:expression>${objId}</activiti:expression>
        </activiti:field>
        <activiti:field name="objTypeId">
          <activiti:expression>${objTypeId}</activiti:expression>
        </activiti:field>
      </extensionElements>
    </serviceTask>
    <sequenceFlow targetRef="endevent1" sourceRef="servicetask1" id="flow4"/>
    <sequenceFlow targetRef="servicetask1" sourceRef="exclusivegateway1" name="GET" id="flow5">
      <conditionExpression xsi:type="tFormalExpression">${apidata_method == "GET"}</conditionExpression>
    </sequenceFlow>
    <serviceTask activiti:class="plugins.fact_components.api_APIdocSite_List_Recs" name="List Record" id="servicetask2">
      <extensionElements>
        <activiti:field name="objTypeId">
          <activiti:expression>${objTypeId}</activiti:expression>
        </activiti:field>
      </extensionElements>
    </serviceTask>
    <sequenceFlow targetRef="endevent1" sourceRef="servicetask2" id="flow6"/>
    <serviceTask activiti:class="plugins.fact_components.api_APIdocSite_Create" name="Create" id="servicetask3">
      <extensionElements>
        <activiti:field name="objId">
          <activiti:expression>${objId}</activiti:expression>
        </activiti:field>
        <activiti:field name="objTypeId">
          <activiti:expression>${objTypeId}</activiti:expression>
        </activiti:field>
        <activiti:field name="data">
          <activiti:expression>${data}</activiti:expression>
        </activiti:field>
      </extensionElements>
    </serviceTask>
    <sequenceFlow targetRef="servicetask3" sourceRef="exclusivegateway1" name="POST" id="flow7">
      <conditionExpression xsi:type="tFormalExpression">${apidata_method == "POST"}</conditionExpression>
    </sequenceFlow>
    <sequenceFlow targetRef="endevent1" sourceRef="servicetask3" id="flow8"/>
  </process>
  <bpmndi:BPMNDiagram id="BPMNDiagram_site_provider">
    <bpmndi:BPMNPlane id="BPMNPlane_site_provider" bpmnElement="site_provider">
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="BPMNShape_startevent1" bpmnElement="startevent1">
        <omgdc:Bounds y="164.0" x="70.0" width="35.0" height="35.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="BPMNShape_endevent1" bpmnElement="endevent1">
        <omgdc:Bounds y="164.0" x="740.0" width="35.0" height="35.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="BPMNShape_exclusivegateway1" bpmnElement="exclusivegateway1">
        <omgdc:Bounds y="161.0" x="150.0" width="40.0" height="40.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="BPMNShape_servicetask1" bpmnElement="servicetask1">

      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="BPMNShape_servicetask2" bpmnElement="servicetask2">

      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="BPMNEdge_flow1" bpmnElement="flow1">
